amendment.description: Amendment sought to improve FERC's public comment and transparency process.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 236 (Roll no. 400).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House

Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
